metadata.title: CVE-2024-26667 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/msm/dpu: check for valid hw_pp in dpu_encoder_helper_phys_cleanupThe commit 8b45a26f2ba9 ("drm/msm/dpu: reserve cdm blocks for writebackin case of YUV output") introduced a smatch warning about anotherconditional block in dpu_encoder_helper_phys_cleanup() which had assumedhw_pp will always be valid which may not necessarily be true.Lets fix the other conditional block by making sure hw_pp is validbefore dereferencing it.Patchwork: https://patchwork.freedesktop.org/patch/574878/

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
